column4: I go to an online school via K12.com and when I try to log-in, since it's flash, it just shows a blank white screen. I mean, YouTube and other flash sites work, so why doesn't this one?
It works on Windows XP by the way.
are you using adobe's flash or gnash?
when you click on login does any flash content load at all?  i.e. do you see the progress bar for "loading" and the K12 logo?
